
FILE: 
lib41.sit.hqx


CONTENTS:
CodeWarrior versions of the library.


INSTRUCTIONS:
On a Macintosh, run Stuff-It to open the
file and extract it.  Then place the contents
in the appropriate lib and include directories
recommended in the CodeWarrior documentation.

This version includes the LIBPRESS 4.1.1 patch.
